BufferHandle¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Codec | Display

Description:

Defines the buffer handle type. The virtual address of a handle maps to its physical address.

Defines the buffer handle, including the shared memory key, shared memory ID, and physical memory address.

Summary¶
